thread.title: Ricky Rubio Trade Rumors: Wolves PG Reportedly a 'Significant Target' for Knicks
thread.title_full: Ricky Rubio Trade Rumors: Wolves PG Reportedly a 'Significant Target' for Knicks

author: Tim Daniels
title: Ricky Rubio Trade Rumors: Wolves PG Reportedly a 'Significant Target' for Knicks
text: Ricky Rubio Trade Rumors: Wolves PG Reportedly a 'Significant Target' for Knicks Hannah Foslien/Getty Images Tim Daniels Featured Columnist February 23, 2017 The New York Knicks continue to show serious interest in Minnesota Timberwolves point guard Ricky Rubio ahead of the NBA trade deadline Thursday at 3 p.m. ET. Adrian Wojnarowski of The Vertical reported Rubio "remains a significant target" for New York as it looks to bolster its backcourt in the final hours before the trade window closes. More to follow.
